body:
Select * From dbo.RN100_ObjectsM ROM Where ROM.ITObjectName In ('RN100_ObjectsD', 'RN100_ObjectsVeriIslemleri' )
Go

Update  ROM
Set     ROM.CrType = 2, ROM.IsITUpdate = ROM.IsITUpdate
From    dbo.RN100_ObjectsM ROM
Where   ROM.ITObjectName In ('RN100_ObjectsD', 'RN100_ObjectsVeriIslemleri')
